subtitle: These garlicky green beans go particularly well with hearty stews.

method.text: Place the beans in a pan of boiling water. Boil for 5-6 min until tender. Drain thoroughly, then immediately immerse in a bowl of cold water and drain again. (This helps the beans to retain their bright green colour.)
Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan. Add the garlic, breadcrumbs, parsley and seasoning. Cook for 1 min, stirring constantly. Add the butter and, when melted, return the beans to the pan.
Heat through gently for 2 min or until piping hot. Spoon into a warmed serving dish.

title: Haricots verts a l'ail
